course.description: A course offered by the institution

departmentObject.description: The department a course belongs to

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)

courseListingObject.description: An actual instantiation in time and space of a course

externalId.description: An external identifier associated with this listing

servicepointObject.description: The service point associated with this listing's reserves

pickupLocation.description: indicates whether or not the service point is a pickup location

holdShelfExpiryPeriod.description: schema for time-period, which contains time interval 'duration' and the time unit

intervalId.description: Unit of time for the duration

staffSlips.description: List of staff slips for this service point

id.description: The ID of the staff slip

printByDefault.description: Whether or not to print the staff slip by default

locationObject.description: The location associated with this listing's reserves

id.description: id of this (shelf) location record as UUID.

code.description: Code of the (shelf) location, usually an abbreviation of the name.

discoveryDisplayName.description: Name of the (shelf) location to be shown in the discovery.

isActive.description: Whether this (shelf) location is active. Inactive (shelf) locations can no longer been used.

institutionId.description: The UUID of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

campusId.description: The UUID of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

libraryId.description: The UUID of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

primaryServicePoint.description: The UUID of the primary service point of this (shelf) location.

servicePointIds.description: All service points that this (shelf) location has.

items.description: The UUID of a service point that belongs to this (shelf) location.

termObject.description: Temporal periods that listings exist in

startDate.description: The beginning of the time period

endDate.description: The ending of the time period

instructorObjects.description: A listing of associated instructor objects

items.description: Describes an instructor for a given section

patronGroup.description: The id of the patrongroup associated with the user

group.description: the unique name of the group
